scripts.dev:api: pnpm --silent exec -- bash -lc 'cd packages/api-go && go run ./cmd/api'
scripts.dev:worker: pnpm --silent exec -- bash -lc 'if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; source .env; set +a; fi; cd packages/worker-py && PY_BIN=python; if command -v python3.11 >/dev/null 2>&1; then PY_BIN=python3.11; fi && if [ -d .venv ]; then VENV_PY=.venv/bin/python; if [ ! -x "$VENV_PY" ]; then rm -rf .venv; else VENV_VER=$($VENV_PY -c "import sys; print(f\"{sys.version_info[0]}.{sys.version_info[1]}\")"); TARGET_VER=$($PY_BIN -c "import sys; print(f\"{sys.version_info[0]}.{sys.version_info[1]}\")"); if [ "$VENV_VER" != "$TARGET_VER" ]; then rm -rf .venv; fi; fi; fi && if [ ! -d .venv ]; then "$PY_BIN" -m venv .venv; fi && .venv/bin/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && .venv/bin/python -m worker.worker'
